column4: Hi all ! I just installed Ubuntu 9.04 (DualBoot XP/Ubuntu using grub). When I launch Ubuntu, the login page comes. I enter my login and my password, but when I submit, I get a black sreen. I just can see the mouse cursor. Any help ?
Hi. Can someone help me to fix my black screen problem (just after Ubuntu login) on my Ubuntu 9.04 64bits ?
switch to a tty (ctrl+alt+F1) and try startx as a command
